text: Guting is a metro station on the Songshan-Xindian Line and Zhonghe-Xinlu Line in Taipei, Taiwan. The station code of the Songshan-Xindian line station is G09 and the station code of the Zhonghe-Xinlu line station is O05. == Station layout information == Both station platforms are located underground. The Songshan-Xindian line platforms are stacked on top of each other, which is the same for the Zhonghe-Xinlu line platforms. This allows you to walk straight ahead to the front platform when transferring without having to walk long distances. Platform 1 is served by the Songshan-Xindian line and is for Songshan. Platform 2 is served by the Zhonghe-Xinlu line and is for Luzhou or Huilong. Platform 3 is served by the Songshan-Xindian line and is for Xindian or Taipower Building. Platform 4 is served by the Zhonghe-Xinlu line and is for Nanshijiao. == Around the station == * Leputing * Taiwan Academy of Banking and Finance Category:Railway stations in Taipei
title: Guting metro station
